snippet: New York State declared a public health emergency on Saturday, making access to vaccines more easily available. Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo urged all residents to get their flu shots.
abstract: New York State declared a public health emergency on Saturday, making access to vaccines more easily available. Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo urged all residents to get their flu shots.

headline.main: Cuomo Declares Public Health Emergency Over Flu Outbreak

keywords.name: organizations
